page.title: 09Unemployment in Ditchingham
page.content: With manual workers now probably less than half the total labour force & automation affecting manufacturing industries there seems little likelihood of a drop from 11% of those now unemployed.IN Ditchingham young people have been the worst affected. On the Windmill Green estate (30 council houses) there are atleast 4 younster of 18,19 years without jobs. One girl having followed a manpower services course at Lowestoft full time for 12 months then worked at a chicken factory for eight weeks,an old peoples home for 4 months, was made redundant & has had no job since. She is now nineteen & though not unintelligent singularly lacking in motivation.There has been a steady shift from manufact uring to service industries,so perhaps it is in this area that young people may see most hope for the future.
